value.original: Imports products from a file into the application
Import Products will bring a file of products, in a predefined format into the application.
Create Prices based on parameters of this version
Create Prices for this pricelist version in the sequence of the Discount Schema Price List. Lines with a higher sequence overwrite existing prices. The sequence should be from generic to specific.
The inventory count lines are generated. You can add new lines or delete lines.

row.value: The inventory count lines are generated. You can add new lines or delete lines.

value.original: The Book Quantity is updated with current book quantity

row.value: The Book Quantity is updated with current book quantity

value.original: The Update Quantity Process will update the book quantity with the current book quantity.

row.value: The Update Quantity Process will update the book quantity with the current book quantity.

value.original: Process Inventory count and update Inventory

row.value: Process Inventory count and update Inventory

value.original: Copy and overwrite all accounts to system defaults (DANGEROUS!!!)
Process Shipment will move products out of inventory and mark line items as shipped.
Copy and overwrite Accouts to Business Partners of this group
Copy all tabs and fields of the window
Products with more than one vendor
Vendor Selection is initated when there is a product that is supplied by more than one vendor. It allows the selection of a specific vendor for a Purchase Order.
Process Inventory Movements will update inventory quantities based on the defined movements between warehouses or locations.
The report shows transaction summary for stored products

row.value: The report shows transaction summary for stored products

value.original: Report lists products to be replenished

row.value: Report lists products to be replenished

value.original: The Verify BOM Structure checks the elements and steps which comprise a Bill of Materials.

row.value: The Verify BOM Structure checks the elements and steps which comprise a Bill of Materials.

value.original: Create production lines, if not created - otherwise process the production
Create/Post Production will generate the production lines and process the production. If the production lines already exisit, the the production will be processed
Copy and overwrite Accounts to Products of this category

The Copy Accounts Process will take the accounts defined for a product category and copy them to any product that references this category. If an account exists at the product level it will be overwritten.
Create and process delivery Receipt from this invoice. The invoice should be correct and completed.
Payments not reconciled with Bank Statement

row.value: Payments not reconciled with Bank Statement

value.original: This reverses the allocation and allows you to allocate the invoice and payment again
Create and process Invoice from this receipt. The receipt should be correct and completed.
Generate Invoice from Receipt will create an invoice based on the selected receipt and match the invoice to that receipt.
The report shows product transactions with valuation

row.value: The report shows product transactions with valuation

value.original: The Copy From Process will generate lines for the current project based on the lines of an exisiting project which the user selects.

The Generate Order process will generate a new Order document based on the project. A price list must be indicated on the project. When the process is started you will be prompted to select a warehouse.
Open/Close all Base Document Types for this Period
Write-off receivables causes the invoices selected by the criteria to be marked as paid and the open invoice amount to be written off.

row.value: Write-off receivables causes the invoices selected by the criteria to be marked as paid and the open invoice amount to be written off.

value.original: Synchronize the terminology within the system.
Based on the entries in Window Element, the fields in windows, parameters, etc. are synchronized, if they are centrally maintained.
Create Dictionary Columns of Table not existing as a Column but in the Database
If you have added colums in the database to this table, this procedure creates the Column records in the Dictionary. Please be aware, that they may deleted, if the entity typs is not set to User.
Create Frield from Table, which do not exist in the Tab yet
Based on the Table of this Tab, this procedure creates the missing Frields
Resubmit posting of documents with posting errors
Documents with posting errors are reset to be posted by the next run of the accounting engine - after fixing the cause (e.g. opening period).

Delete accounting records of documents to be re-created by the next run of the accounting engine. This is a dramatic step and you want to do this ONLY after changes of the accounting structure (e.g. different default accounts, etc.) and if fixing via manual Jornal entries is not sensible.

row.value: Delete accounting records of documents to be re-created by the next run of the accounting engine. This is a dramatic step and you want to do this ONLY after changes of the accounting structure (e.g. different default accounts, etc.) and if fixing via manual Jornal entries is not sensible.

value.original: Find or Create Business Partner from Request
Verify existance of language translation in system (required after creating a new language)
Verify the translation creates missing translation records. Start this process after creating a new language. It will create new records by copying the base language entries.
Report lists products with their on-hand quantity and values at the valuation date

row.value: Report lists products with their on-hand quantity and values at the valuation date

value.original: Change database table definition from application dictionary

When selected, the database column definition is updated based on your entries in the Column definition of the Application Dictionary. Note that not all changes are supported by the database and may result in an error.
Sets furure cost price and standard cost price
For Standard Costing you can - update the future cost price - set the standard cost price to the future cost price
Recompile Functions, Procedures, Triggers, Views, etc.
Create Invoices from Expenses for Customers

row.value: Create Invoices from Expenses for Customers

value.original: Create AP Invoices from Expenses to be paid to employees

row.value: Create AP Invoices from Expenses to be paid to employees

value.original: Copy Report Columns from other Column Set
Copy columns at the end of this Column Set
Copy Report Lines from other Line Set
Copy lines at the end of this Line Set
Set for all Print Formats with same Landscape/Portrait
Copy existing or create Print Format from Table

row.value: Copy existing or create Print Format from Table

value.original: Create Purchase Order from Sales Orders

row.value: Create Purchase Order from Sales Orders

value.original:
After completing sales orders, you can create one or more purchase orders for each sales order. A purchase order references always only one sales order (i.e. no consolidation of sales orders).
POs are created for all sales order lines where the product has a current vendor, the vendor has a Vendor Price List with all Products on the most current Price List Version. The Unit of Measure is copied; PO and SO can have different currencies.
Once the process is run, you need to synchronize the SO/PO manually (e.g. in case of additional lines and changed lines (product & quantity).

row.value:
After completing sales orders, you can create one or more purchase orders for each sales order. A purchase order references always only one sales order (i.e. no consolidation of sales orders).
POs are created for all sales order lines where the product has a current vendor, the vendor has a Vendor Price List with all Products on the most current Price List Version. The Unit of Measure is copied; PO and SO can have different currencies.
Once the process is run, you need to synchronize the SO/PO manually (e.g. in case of additional lines and changed lines (product & quantity).
